137 // Function: composed_of
138 inline tf::Task Taskflow::composed_of(Taskflow& taskflow) {
139  auto &node = _graph.emplace_back();
140  node._module = &taskflow;
141  return Task(node);
142 }

144 // Procedure: dump
145 inline std::string Taskflow::dump() const {
146  std::ostringstream oss;
147  dump(oss);
148  return oss.str();
149 }
150 
151 // Function: dump
152 inline void Taskflow::dump(std::ostream& os) const {
153 
154  std::stack<const Taskflow*> stack;
155  std::unordered_set<const Taskflow*> visited;
156 
157  os << "digraph Taskflow_";
158  if(_name.empty()) os << 'p' << this;
159  else os << _name;
160  os << " {\nrankdir=\"LR\";\n";
161 
162  stack.push(this);
163  visited.insert(this);
164 
165  while(!stack.empty()) {
166 
167  auto f = stack.top();
168  stack.pop();
169 
170  // create a subgraph field for this taskflow
171  os << "subgraph cluster_";
172  if(f->_name.empty()) os << 'p' << f;
173  else os << f->_name;
174  os << " {\n";
175 
176  os << "label=\"Taskflow_";
177  if(f->_name.empty()) os << 'p' << f;
178  else os << f->_name;
179  os << "\";\n";
180 
181  // dump the details of this taskflow
182  for(const auto& n : f->_graph.nodes()) {
183 
184  // regular task
185  if(auto module = n->_module; !module) {
186  n->dump(os);
187  }
188  // module task
189  else {
190  os << 'p' << n.get() << "[shape=box3d, color=blue, label=\"";
191  if(n->_name.empty()) os << n.get();
192  else os << n->_name;
193  os << " (Taskflow_";
194  if(module->_name.empty()) os << module;
195  else os << module->_name;
196  os << ")\"];\n";
197 
198  if(visited.find(module) == visited.end()) {
199  visited.insert(module);
200  stack.push(module);
201  }
202 
203  for(const auto s : n->_successors) {
204  os << 'p' << n.get() << "->" << 'p' << s << ";\n";
205  }
206  }
207  }
208  os << "}\n";
209  }
210 
211  os << "}\n";
212 }
213 
214 // Backward compatibility
215 using Framework = Taskflow;
216 
217 } // end of namespace tf. ---------------------------------------------------
